item.title: Golden State Warriors: An Offensive Juggernaut
item.description: The 21st century saw basketball change. The game has developed so much over the last 21 years. But the game has also drastically changed over the last few years. Teams have begun shooting the ball at rates far higher than weâ€™ve ever seen before. One of the main reasons for that is the Golden State Warriors. Following a disappointing first round exit to the Los Angeles Clippers in 2014, the Warriors ownership group decided to fire Mark Jackson and hire Steve Kerr.

item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to my blog! Featured here will be a variety of things including some data visualizations project primairly aimed at sports data, as that is what I am passionate about. I love watching and playing sports. I am a huge fan of all Bay Area teams, except the A’s and Raiders (even though they now play in Las Vegas).
